definition_en: An independent agency of the United States government tasked with protecting public health and safety related to nuclear energy.
definition_ko: 원자력 에너지와 관련된 공중 보건 및 안전을 보호하는 임무를 맡은 미국 정부의 독립 기관.

slots.context_ko: U.S. Nuclear Regulatory Commission Office of Nuclear Regulatory Research Washington, DC 20555-0001
